message: Just wanted to get your thoughts on the elgg social networking platform. Has anyone used it? can you share example sites made using this platform? Anyone design templates for Elgg? elgg.com
would like to know the answer to that too

You know, I tried Elgg, but it was really too overcomplicated. I ended up building http://them4life.net using BuddyPress instead. It's just a simple way for my friends and I from our LDS mission to stay connected.

I went through Elgg, Joomla, Drupal, and Mingle (another wordpress plugin) before I settled on BuddyPress.
Just for kicks though: http://docs.elgg.org/wiki/Sites_powered_by_Elgg is a list of sites that are powered by Elgg
